title: Learn about the interpretation of a wet dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretations of wet dreams: Seeing wet dreams carries for the dreamer signs of goodness and blessing, and indicates the extent of happiness that he has enjoyed recently, and this was a summary of the interpretations received by interpretive scholars about this dream. Interpretations of wet dreams: Seeing wet in a dream is considered one of the good dreams that lead to an abundance of good and good profits in reality, And the happy news that the dreamer will receive soon and that will make him feel happy and joyful. If one is sick and sees himself wet in a dream, this means that he will recover, relieve his fatigue, improve his condition in general and return to his normal life. If a poor person sees in a dream a wet and beautiful figure, this It indicates that he will obtain a wide livelihood and work will come to him that will improve his standard of living and he will obtain a large amount of money. When a merchant sees a good liquid in a dream, this indicates the many profits that he will make and that he will expand his business and bring him a large profit, which will make him happy and satisfied. To reach For the most accurate interpretation of your dream, visit the “Secrets of Dream Interpretation” website on Google, which includes thousands of interpretations by leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of a Wet Dream Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin told us that seeing wetness in a dream means many good things that the dreamer will receive, and that He will obtain a set of things that he wants in the world. If a person sees himself wet in his dream, this is good evidence of freedom from worries and enjoying a distinguished life as mentioned in the glorious Book of God in Surat Maryam. When a person sees himself wet in a dream and fears something, this It means that God will help him get rid of those fears and anxiety that he feels and arrange things for him so that he can be sure of the Lord’s help. The indication that Sirin also shows that seeing wet in a dream means that the person will start a new phase in his life and will be able to reach the ambitions that he has arranged from Before. Interpretation of a liquid dream for a single woman: Seeing a person wet in her dream symbolizes freedom from worries, relief from sadness, and the comfort and happiness that she feels now after suffering for a period of trouble. In the event that a girl sees that her family has gathered at a table with a lot of wetness in the dream , this means that they are a close-knit family and that they love each other and that friendship and respect prevail between them. If an unmarried woman sees that she is getting wet from someone she does not know about the solution, this means that there is something that God very much wants to achieve for her and she will get her desires, God willing. In the event that a girl dreams If the woman is engaged, she gets a romantic date from her fiancé. This is good evidence of their strong relationship and strong love for each other, and God has blessed them with a close marriage. Interpretation of a dream about wetness for a married woman: Wetness in a married woman’s sleep is one of the good things that will happen to her in the near future, God willing. If the woman She suffers from a certain disease that is difficult to treat and she sees in a dream a lot of liquids and good things, this indicates that she will recover soon and recover gradually. When she eats

title: Interpretation of seeing a hotel in a dream and its meaning

preview.html: Interpretation of the hotel’s view by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing a hotel in a dream: It indicates the goodness and benefit that the dreamer obtains. Seeing a hotel with clean rooms in a dream is evidence of the comfort and psychological calm in which the dreamer lives. As for the patient who sees a hotel in a dream, this indicates the seriousness of the disease that leads to To death. A dream about a hotel in some visions is an indication of travel. Interpretation of a dream about a Nabulsi hotel. A dream about a hotel in Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation indicates a temporary marriage. A hotel in a dream for a man is an indication of a business opportunity. As for a married man who sees a hotel in a dream, this indicates the birth A man soon. A dream about seeing a hotel for single people. Seeing a hotel in an unmarried girl’s dream with comfortable, clean rooms and a beautiful appearance is evidence of happy events in the coming period. If a girl sees inside the dream that the hotel rooms are ugly and dirty, which indicates the problems and issues she faces. Seeing a dream about an old hotel in a dream indicates To many problems and troubles that she is going through. Interpretation of seeing a hotel for a married woman. A married woman who sees a hotel in a dream is a sign of stability in married life. If a married woman dreams that she is staying in a five-star hotel and the room is beautiful, this indicates prosperity and the high class in which she lives. If a married woman sees that she is staying in a hotel and the room is beautiful, this indicates happiness and abundance of sustenance. A dream of a hotel for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream that she is entering a hotel, this indicates the psychological stability in which she lives. If a pregnant woman dreams that she is entering an old hotel, this is evidence On the illness that befell her. Seeing hotel rooms in a pregnant woman’s dream is good news. Interpretation of a dream about a hotel for a manInterpretation of dreams: A hotel in a man’s dream indicates sustenance and kindness. As for a dream about a hotel with a foul smell, it is a sign of upcoming problems and the careful viewer. title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing two pigeons in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing two pigeons in a dreamInterpretation of dreamsVision: Bathing in a dream is considered one of the good dreams indicative of goodness, safety, and protection from God. Seeing two pigeons in a dream is good news and happiness, and an indication of the enormous wealth and money that must be acquired. Also, seeing two pigeons in a dream is one of the visions that indicate Good and happy marriage and relationships in the dreamer’s life. But seeing a dead dove in a dream is considered a sign of a sad life and misfortunes and disasters that may befall the dreamer. To dream of hunting doves means that the dreamer will collect a lot of money and great wealth with which he will be honored in this world. Interpretation of seeing two doves in A dream for a single woman: Seeing two doves in a dream for an unmarried woman is good news and means the nearness of joys and happiness that will enter her life. Also, seeing a dove in a dream for an unmarried woman means calm, peace, psychological comfort, and relief from her worries. Two doves in a dream for a fiancée are good and indicate the completion of her good marriage. With the right and fair person. A dove in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates success, success, and obtaining many wishes and achieving goals. Interpretation of seeing two doves in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about two doves in a dream for a married woman indicates marital happiness, the end of her troubles, and recovery from her illness. The married woman who She sees two doves in a dream and holding them is evidence that she will enjoy a lot of goodness and blessings. Seeing a dove in a dream for a married woman is one of the praiseworthy dreams, and a white dove in her dream indicates nourishment with pregnancy and children. Interpretation of seeing two doves in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of seeing a white dove in a dream for a woman A pregnant woman is evidence from God that she will give birth to a baby girl, and God knows best. Seeing two doves in a dream for a pregnant woman at the beginning of pregnancy means that she will be blessed with twins and will enjoy great happiness and wealth. Carrying a dove in a dream for a pregnant woman is one of the visions that indicate good and widespread glaucoma and great benefit. Also, seeing a dove in a dream for a pregnant woman means an easy and affordable birth, good conditions, and an end to problems. Interpretation of seeing two doves in a dream for a man: If you see a man buying a dove from someone he knows, this means the goodness and benefit he will get from him in reality. A dove in a dream is considered a good sign. And peace for the man, and indicates the end of the problems and disagreements that he suffered in his life. The interpretation of a dream about two doves in a dream for an unmarried young man is one of the visions that indicate that God will bless him with a good and good wife. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of Experts will reply to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a pen cap in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a pen cap in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a pen cap in a dream indicates victory in the dreamer’s life, his success, and his superiority. Likewise, if a married man dreams that he is writing a topic, this indicates the collapse of her worries, his good condition, and his family. Seeing a pen cap or Writing with a pen in a dream indicates the disappearance of worries and the direction towards correct deeds in this world and the afterlife for God. Interpretation of seeing a pen cap in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is removing the pen cap from a pen, this indicates the greatness of her happiness, her superiority, and the fulfillment of her desires. Also, the dream What she writes with a pen indicates the death of the girl’s worries, her imminent marriage, and the writing of her book, which will happen, and God knows best. If you see the cap of a pen in a dream, this means that it is moving, then this indicates envy, bad deeds that will occur, and malignant disease. Also, seeing a pen in a dream indicates wonderful excellence and deeds. Good deeds performed by an unmarried girl indicate happiness and sustenance. Interpretation of seeing a pen cap in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman sees in her dream that she threw a pen cap in the trash, this means that she has committed many sins and in reality she will regret them. Also, seeing a pen cap in A dream for a married woman indicates the death of her sorrows and also shows that she has committed many sins and that she does not regret. Also, seeing a married girl’s hat in a dream indicates good worship and indicates serious things that will happen to her. Interpretation of seeing a pen cap in a dream for a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman sees in her dream That she covers the pen, this means that her newborn will excel and memorize the Holy Qur’an. Also, seeing the cover of a pen in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that her due date will be determined and means that the pain of childbirth will be eased, God willing. Interpretation of seeing the cover of a pen in a dream for a manIf one sees it in a dream That he writes and reads well, this means that the dreamer’s worries are over and that the happiness he sees is great. Also, seeing a hat and losing it in front of a single person indicates his close marriage to a good girl who does good deeds. Also, seeing a pen cap in a dream indicates that a married man will have offspring. A good and healthy child from all diseases. Interpretation of seeing a red pen in a dream: If a person dreams in a dream that he wrote with a red pen, this indicates that he is committing sins and committing immoral acts and misdeeds for which the dreamer does not repent. Likewise, seeing a red pen in a dream indicates that the dreamer’s condition is not Good, indicates a serious illness, and indicates the object of indecent lust. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream on various occasions. Our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, and his delivery to one of the prophets known for their justice and piety. God sent him to the people to be guided by him. They have the right and righteousness and are warned of God’s vast paradise and warned of the torment of hellfire. The Virgin Lady gave birth to him without having intercourse with a man, and it is certain that seeing our Lord Jesus in a dream is one of the things that portends good things and that Satan cannot be incarnated in the form of a prophet. See today’s Encyclopedia article for more details. Interpretation of seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that the vision of the descent of our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, is a vision that shows the personality of its owner with benefit and kindness to himself and to others, and because the miracle of our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, may God bless him and grant him peace, which God sent him to heal the blind and the lepers, and that God gave him the knowledge of medicine for which his people became famous . Seeing him in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge of medicine, and Ibn Sirin adds that whoever dreams that the Virgin Mary and his wife are pregnant will give birth to a child characterized by wisdom and opinion. Ibn Sirin agrees with other interpreters that the descent of Christ in a dream is a sign of the coming of goodness and the attainment of goodness. The ample livelihood that he suffers from. Interpretation of seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen explains that whoever finds in a dream the descent of our Lord Jesus, this is evidence that the dreamer is a person who travels a lot or that he is a person immune from any harm. As for whoever finds that he If he changes and becomes the Prophet of God Jesus in a dream, or sees that he is wearing his clothes, then he will raise his status and position among the people, and it is also an indication that he will obtain a great position or gain more knowledge or establish justice on earth. Seeing our Master Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream can It is an indication of a lack of faith or confusion in a matter of religion, and seeing it could indicate that the dreamer is accusing people of something they are not, or are making. He did not do this, and this is due to the Almighty saying: And they did not kill him, nor did they crucify him, but rather made him resemble them. And his saying: The Christians said that Jesus is the Son of God. And his saying: What did God take from the Son? It may herald the arrival of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, with good news, perhaps guidance from God because our master Muhammad was sent to guide people to the truth, and it may be a sign of God’s response to the Prophet’s prayers and the realization of the things that we hope will happen, God willing. It is possible that it is a vision of the descent Our Master Jesus is a sign of the descent of God’s success, payment, and care that will include the seer, because at the end of time our Master Jesus will descend to earth to kill the Antichrist. He spreads justice on earth and helps believers. On the contrary, seeing the descent of our Lord Jesus may indicate God’s wrath upon the dreamer, because the people of our Lord Jesus asked God for a table to descend for them from heaven, and God became angry with them. Interpretation of seeing Jesus descending in an unmarried girl’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that our Lord Jesus is descending from heaven, then this is her brother.
preview.text: Seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream on various occasions. Our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, and his delivery to one of the prophets known for their justice and piety. God sent him to the people to be guided by him. They have the right and righteousness and are warned of God’s vast paradise and warned of the torment of hellfire. The Virgin Lady gave birth to him without having intercourse with a man, and it is certain that seeing our Lord Jesus in a dream is one of the things that portends good things and that Satan cannot be incarnated in the form of a prophet. See today’s Encyclopedia article for more details. Interpretation of seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great translator Ibn Sirin believes that the vision of the descent of our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, is a vision that shows the personality of its owner with benefit and kindness to himself and to others, and because the miracle of our Lord Jesus, peace be upon him, may God bless him and grant him peace, which God sent him to heal the blind and the lepers, and that God gave him the knowledge of medicine for which his people became famous . Seeing him in a dream is an indication that the dreamer will gain a lot of knowledge of medicine, and Ibn Sirin adds that whoever dreams that the Virgin Mary and his wife are pregnant will give birth to a child characterized by wisdom and opinion. Ibn Sirin agrees with other interpreters that the descent of Christ in a dream is a sign of the coming of goodness and the attainment of goodness. The ample livelihood that he suffers from. Interpretation of seeing the descent of Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream by Ibn Shaheen: Ibn Shaheen explains that whoever finds in a dream the descent of our Lord Jesus, this is evidence that the dreamer is a person who travels a lot or that he is a person immune from any harm. As for whoever finds that he If he changes and becomes the Prophet of God Jesus in a dream, or sees that he is wearing his clothes, then he will raise his status and position among the people, and it is also an indication that he will obtain a great position or gain more knowledge or establish justice on earth. Seeing our Master Jesus, peace be upon him, in a dream can It is an indication of a lack of faith or confusion in a matter of religion, and seeing it could indicate that the dreamer is accusing people of something they are not, or are making. He did not do this, and this is due to the Almighty saying: And they did not kill him, nor did they crucify him, but rather made him resemble them. And his saying: The Christians said that Jesus is the Son of God. And his saying: What did God take from the Son? It may herald the arrival of the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, with good news, perhaps guidance from God because our master Muhammad was sent to guide people to the truth, and it may be a sign of God’s response to the Prophet’s prayers and the realization of the things that we hope will happen, God willing. It is possible that it is a vision of the descent Our Master Jesus is a sign of the descent of God’s success, payment, and care that will include the seer, because at the end of time our Master Jesus will descend to earth to kill the Antichrist. He spreads justice on earth and helps believers. On the contrary, seeing the descent of our Lord Jesus may indicate God’s wrath upon the dreamer, because the people of our Lord Jesus asked God for a table to descend for them from heaven, and God became angry with them. Interpretation of seeing Jesus descending in an unmarried girl’s dream: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that our Lord Jesus is descending from heaven, then this is her brother.

title: Interpretations of dreams in the language of glue

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about gums in different situations. The tongue is the organ responsible for speech and pronunciation. It is heavy and unable to speak, which indicates many problems. He can see in his dream that his tongue is cut off and causes severe pain. Interpretation of seeing the tongue in a dream: Dream interpretation scholars say: If a person sees in his dream that his tongue is tied and he cannot untie it, this means that the dreamer suffers from extreme poverty, illness, and widespread debt. He seeks ease in life. If one sees in a dream that part of his tongue sticks out or bites his tongue, this means that the dreamer regrets many of his words and shows that person’s many mistakes and that he will feel very sorry for him. But if one sees in a dream that his tongue has grown greatly, This vision indicates getting rid of enemies and winning competitors. If he sees hair growing on his tongue and its color is black, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will fall into a great misfortune, and if he sees white hair on his tongue, then this vision indicates evil, yes, and this will happen often. It happens to the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a sore tongue and the inability to speak: Dream interpretation jurists say that if he sees in a dream that his tongue is heavy and he is unable to speak, then this vision indicates that the dreamer is suffering from many problems in his religion, and this vision shows people’s corruption, immorality, and poor learning. . The hadith categorically indicates that he will get rid of enemies in his life. If a man sees in a dream that his tongue is tied and unable to speak, this indicates the eloquence and tact of that person in ordinary life, unable to express it. To get a different interpretation of dreams, you can use Live Dream Interpretation App.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing whole halva in a dream and what is its meaning?

preview.html: The interpretation of halva in a dream is complete, from the books of major scholars in the interpretation of dreams and visions, and seeing halva in a dream is one of the desired visions, which indicates kindness and support for its viewer. Therefore, in this appropriate article you will find and explain the details of the complete knowledge of the interpretation of tahini in a dream for healthy, married and pregnant women, as well as for men. What is the interpretation of seeing yourself eating tahini? Ibn SirinIbn Sirin talks about knowing the full meaning of eating halva in a dream. Seeing halva in a dream indicates to the dreamer a new job and success. Eating sweets for the dreamer indicates salvation from sorrows and worries. I dreamed of eating halva, and it tasted wonderful, which testifies to achieving Dreams and goals that the dreamer pursues. The interpretation of seeing halva in a dream full of greed indicates that the dreamer will receive a lot of money in the future. Why does an ordinary woman dream of halva? Eating sweets in a dream full of an ordinary woman speaks of a close marriage with a good man. Why does a woman dream of Alone eating tahini, denotes a good girl and the big blue. A girl buying sweets in a dream indicates that happiness and joy will come to her in the next life. Eating whole halva in a dream is one of the visions that show that a noble woman will achieve the desires and goals that she seeks to achieve. Interpretation of the vision of halva for a married woman. Why does a woman dream of halva and take it from her husband, which indicates happiness and stability between her and her husband? Why dream that you are eating tahini for a married woman, and it tastes good, which indicates the end of problems and the stability of her life. Giving halva to a woman in a complete dream indicates Kindness and benefit to her and her family. Buying sweets in a full dream for a married woman indicates the end of the problems and adversities she faces. Why does a pregnant woman dream of halva? Eating halva in a pregnant woman’s dream testifies to the ease of giving birth to the newborn and his good health. In a full dream, a woman offers it to her husband. A large plate of halva, which indicates that her husband will receive a lot of food. Accepting halva from the husband in a full dream also means goodness and abundance of livelihood that they will receive in their next life. Why does halva dream in a dream, full for a man? Making a man sweet in A dream about halva speaks of the arrival of a lot of goodness, food, and benefits. Giving a lonely young man a plate of delicious halva to a girl in a dream, halva means success and great profit in his life. There is general halva in a man’s dream – it is one of the visions that indicate goodness and happiness. If it is You have a dream and want to interpret it, leave it in the comments below and our team will answer you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about failing an exam by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: In the event that Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi did not take the exam, then this topic is one of the opinions that scares everyone who is familiar with all the details, so we will review for you in this article all the information about this topic. Explanation of the student’s failure in the testExplain the scholars: Failing the test is psychological pressure that the person with the vision goes through, especially in The days in which the result appears, as this dream shows that the dreamer is one of those people who are afraid of taking on responsibilities and bear them. Failing the Ibn Sirin exam. Ibn Sirin says that whoever sees himself failing the test, this indicates great pressures to which the dreamer is exposed in reality, and these The vision is also interpreted as the dreamer’s fear of life and what will happen to it. Interpretation of failure in two subjects. Seeing the dreamer failing in two matters indicates that the dreamer will get married or that he will get a good job, and the failure of the vision in some matters indicates that he knows these two matters to a great extent. He failed in exams. Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi Ibn Sirin explained that a student’s failure in an exam or in a course means that the student lives a life in which there is a lot of psychological pressure at that time, and we will learn the details of Ibn Sirin’s view of failing the exam. Witnessing a student failing an exam indicates the student’s anxiety about failure in life in general. Whoever witnesses someone giving him his result, this is evidence that the one who gave him the result is a fan of the dreamer. Seeing someone failing in an exam sometimes indicates the death of someone close to the person who had the vision or Traveling far. If the student sees himself going through trials, then this vision indicates that the student has overcome the problems he faced during this time. Seeing failure in two matters in the dream. Scientists interpret that failure in two subjects has meanings and repercussions that we will explain below: Interpretation scholars interpreted the dream of falling into Two subjects as an indication that the dreamer's marriage is near or that he will find a job with a good salary. Whoever sees himself failing two specific subjects, this is an indication of the student's study and knowledge in the two subjects. If the student sees that he cannot answer exams in a committee or that the student has lost his pen, then this It means that he does not trust himself very much. Seeing a man failing an exam. Scientists have explained that when a person sees himself failing in tests, this is considered a sign from God that he is far from his Lord and that he must approach God again. The vision also shows the person’s problems or problems that The viewer wants it. He fell in. Seeing a single girl failing an exam. Seeing an unmarried girl failing an exam indicates that she is in a relationship that will fail or that she will face many problems in real life. Interpretation of a dream about failing an exam. Al-Nabulsi explained the vision of failing in exams for several points that we will explain below: Al-Nabulsi said that Whoever sees himself failing the test will obtain an excellent position in his job. The vision also indicates the imminent marriage of the dreamer. When one sees that he falls under a certain scientific subject, this indicates his great success in this subject. It is possible that the dream is a sign from God that The dreamer must be village

title: Interpretation of seeing liver in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing the liver in a dream or a dream through an electronic site Vision Seeing the liver in a dream The fortune teller looks behind the sign and is it good or bad for him Today we will present the most important interpretations provided by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and Ibn Sirin, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing the liver in a dream Seeing the liver in a dream indicates that the dreamer has the courage to face situations without fear and pursue his dreams without fear. Seeing the liver in a dream indicates that the viewer has many conflicting feelings such as anxiety, compassion, anger and calm. Seeing the liver in a dream can also indicate the difficulties and problems that the dreamer is going through in his life. Seeing the liver in a dream indicates The best pleasures in the world are money, children and knowledge. Interpretation of seeing the liver in a dream by Ibn Sirin Seeing the liver in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates money and the best pleasure in the world. Seeing the liver in a dream indicates the good qualities of a man such as generosity, kindness and courage. Seeing the liver in a dream can be a warning that there is something wrong with the health of the viewer and he must disclose and be careful. As for seeing a damaged liver in a dream? It indicates the denial of the fortune teller in his children or money, or the disappearance of work , or old age. Broken liver in a dream indicates loss of money or separation of children or lack of access and loss of desires. Interpretation of seeing the liver in a dream for a single woman Seeing the liver in a dream for a single woman indicates her connection to her family and pride in her origins. Seeing the liver indicates the presence of one person in her sleep with lawful food and a blessing in her life and future. Seeing the liver indicates the presence of an unmarried woman in a dream to receive good news soon. If the girl is traveling and sees the liver in a dream, it is a sign of her longing and nostalgia for her family. Seeing the liver of animals in the dream of an unmarried woman, such as goats, cows and sheep, good visions indicate enormous wealth on their way and that they will be happy with it. See other interpretations: Interpretation of the point of view of the bill Interpretation of seeing the currency Interpretation of the names of the offer Interpretation of seeing the kiss Interpretation of seeing intercourse Interpretation of the appearance of menstrual blood Interpretation of seeing rape Interpretation of seeing a young girl Interpretation of seeing the liver in a dream for a married woman Liver in a dream of a married woman indicates her children or the arrival of the pregnancy she was expecting. Seeing eating the liver in a married woman's dream Remind me of prosperity and wealth for her and her husband or her husband obtaining a position New. As for seeing eating human liver in a married woman’s dream? It is a disgusting vision that shows him evil and bad things. Cooking liver in a dream for a married woman is an indication of her ability to bear the responsibility of her home. Roasted liver in a dream for a married woman is an indication of sadness or distress and bad spirit. Buying liver in a dream for a married woman is an indication of ample nutrition and achieving what she wants. Interpretation of seeing liver in a dream for a pregnant woman Seeing liver in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of the approaching date of her birth. Seeing the liver in good condition in a pregnant woman’s dream means that she is free from fatigue and pain and that it benefits her and secures her and her fetus. It helps
